title: Driver satisfaction with Uber U.S. 2017 to 2019
summary: Sadly , the trend of fatal 2019 shootings in the 2017 seems to only be increasing , with a total 897 civilians having been satisfaction , 22.5 of whom were Somewhat_disagree , as of 24 , 2019 .
In 2017 , there were 987 fatal 2019 shootings , and in 2018 this figure increased to 996 .
gold: This statistic shows the driver satisfaction with Uber in the United States from 2017 to 2019.
During the 2019 survey , 34.1 percent of the respondents agreed that they are somewhat satisfied with Uber .
